about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Senior Frontend Developer with over 4 years of professional experience building modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. I specialize in React, Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, with a strong focus on pixel-perfect UI implementation, cross-team collaboration, and UX optimization. I work full-time at Vikarno while also building crypto finance platforms at Qaay and handling freelance projects. I'm deeply passionate about delivering fast, accessible, and multilingual web apps, and I'm known for:
bullets: Deep integration of design into development

entries.title: Senior Frontend Developer
entries.description: Built a comprehensive crypto finance dashboard using Next.js 15 and TypeScript, featuring portfolio management, lending, borrowing, swap, deposit, and withdrawal modules; utilized App Router, SSR/ISR, and route middleware to deliver fast and secure user experiences. Designed and implemented a highly reusable UI system with design tokens, memoized selectors, list virtualization, and Suspense-friendly custom hooks, reducing unnecessary re-renders by ~45% and cumulative layout shift (CLS) by ~30% across the entire platform. Implemented full internationalization (i18n) with RTL support for English and Farsi using edge middleware and localized routing. Integrated Payload CMS for content and admin panels while strengthening authentication flows with secure OTP verification and robust session management. Established a modern CI/CD pipeline using Docker and Bitbucket Pipelines with automated linting and test gates.

entries.title: Senior Frontend Developer
entries.description: Developed high-performance web applications using Next.js 15, leveraging SSR and CSR to optimize user experience, which led to improved user satisfaction and engagement metrics. Built and maintained multilingual support using next-intl, enabling seamless localization and enhancing accessibility for global users across multiple products. Designed and deployed financial applications, including tools for transaction tracking and loan management, improving operational workflows and user self-service capabilities. Customized and extended the ShadCN component library, ensuring a unified and reusable UI system across projects, which cut down development time by over 100 hours. Applied advanced rendering and caching strategies to boost scalability, resulting in up to 1.5 seconds faster page load times across key routes. Performed comprehensive testing and debugging workflows to uphold code quality, decreasing production bugs by nearly 40 incidents.

entries.title: Senior Frontend Developer
entries.description: Developed a fully functional and interactive report page using Highcharts library in React.js, enabling data visualization and analytics for over 1,000 monthly active users, leading to a 15% increase in user engagement. Implemented multi-language support in Next.js 14 applications, leveraging internationalization (i18n) libraries to support 3+ languages, improving accessibility for a global user base. Engineered scalable and performant web applications using Next.js App Router, combining SSR (Server-Side Rendering) and CSR (Client-Side Rendering) techniques to optimize load times and enhance user experience, resulting in a 2-second reduction in page load times. Collaborated with backend and design teams to ensure seamless integration of APIs and UI components, reducing integration-related issues by 20%. Conducted rigorous testing and debugging, maintaining 98% code coverage and minimizing production bugs, leading to a 30% decrease in post-release issues.

entries.title: Teaching Assistant
entries.description: Taught HTML and CSS for building and styling web pages, and JavaScript (ES6, ES7) fundamentals and advanced features to over 300 students. Instructed students on TypeScript fundamentals, enabling robust, type-safe code development, resulting in a 30% improvement in student project stability. Guided students through React.js, including hooks, routing, custom hooks, HOC, and state management. Educated on version control with Git and GitHub, including branching, merging, and pull requests, increasing student collaboration efficiency by 30%. Tutored students in testing and debugging web applications using Jest and React Testing Library, improving test coverage by 40%.
